summary: European crypto-related exchange-traded products witnessed increased net inflows in June and July, reversing three months of outflows.
title: European crypto ETP inflows spike in June and July
content: European crypto-related exchange-traded products witnessed net inflows in June and July. The period of inflows reversed an almost three-month period of global ETP outflows.
